name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: lcd_id
description: Local Coverage Determination (LCD) identifier

name: lcd_title
description: Title of the Local Coverage Determination (LCD)

name: original_effective_date
description: Original effective date for services covered by the LCD

name: revision_effective_date
description: Effective date of the latest revision for services covered by the LCD

name: contractor_name
description: Name of the Medicare Administrative Contractor (MAC)

name: contract_type
description: Type of contract held by the Medicare Administrative Contractor (MAC)

name: mac_contract_number
description: Contract number associated with the Medicare Administrative Contractor (MAC)

name: jurisdiction_type
description: Type of jurisdiction for the Medicare Administrative Contractor (MAC)

name: covered_state
description: State covered by the Medicare Administrative Contractor (MAC) jurisdiction

name: section_1862a1a_exclusion_description
description: Exclusion of expenses for items or services not reasonable and necessary for diagnosis, treatment, or functional improvement per Section 1862(a)(1)(A) of the Social Security Act.

name: section_1833e_prohibition_description
description: Prohibition of Medicare payment for claims lacking necessary information per Section 1833(e) of the Social Security Act.

name: procedure_name_pva
description: General term for Percutaneous Vertebral Augmentation, including vertebroplasty and kyphoplasty.

name: procedure_name_pvp
description: Specific type of Percutaneous Vertebral Augmentation involving percutaneous injection of bone cement.

name: procedure_name_pkp
description: Specific type of Percutaneous Vertebral Augmentation involving balloon tamponade prior to cement injection.

name: diagnosis_osteoporotic_vcf
description: Diagnosis of a vertebral compression fracture caused by osteoporosis.

name: vcf_onset_duration_acute_max_weeks
description: Maximum onset duration for acute Vertebral Compression Fracture (VCF) in weeks.

name: vcf_onset_duration_subacute_min_weeks
description: Minimum onset duration for subacute Vertebral Compression Fracture (VCF) in weeks.

name: vcf_onset_duration_subacute_max_weeks
description: Maximum onset duration for subacute Vertebral Compression Fracture (VCF) in weeks.

name: vcf_anatomical_location
description: Anatomical location of the vertebral compression fracture, ranging from T1 to L5.

name: vcf_imaging_mri_bone_marrow_edema
description: Requirement for documentation of bone marrow edema on MRI for VCF.

name: vcf_imaging_bone_scan_spect_ct_uptake
description: Requirement for documentation of bone-scan/SPECT/CT uptake for VCF.

name: patient_pain_score_nrs_vas_hospitalized_min
description: Minimum Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) or Visual Analog Scale (VAS) pain score for hospitalized patients with symptomatic VCF.

name: patient_pain_score_nrs_vas_non_hospitalized_min
description: Minimum Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) or Visual Analog Scale (VAS) pain score for non-hospitalized patients with symptomatic VCF.

name: non_surgical_management_attempted
description: Indicates if optimal non-surgical management (NSM) has been attempted for non-hospitalized patients.

name: pain_status_worsening
description: Indicates if pain is worsening despite optimal non-surgical management, as an eligibility criterion.

name: pain_status_stable_or_improved_but_score_ge_5
description: Indicates if pain is stable to improved but Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) or Visual Analog Scale (VAS) score is still >=5, as an eligibility criterion.

name: vcf_progression_vertebral_body_height_loss
description: Progression of vertebral body height loss as a criterion for VCF.

name: vcf_vertebral_body_height_reduction_percentage_min
description: Minimum percentage of vertebral body height reduction for VCF, if stable or improved pain with score >=5.

name: vcf_kyphotic_deformity_present
description: Presence of kyphotic deformity as a criterion for VCF, if stable or improved pain with score >=5.

name: vcf_rdq_score_min
description: Minimum Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire (RDQ) score indicating severe impact of VCF on daily functioning, if stable or improved pain with score >=5.

name: bmd_evaluation_referral_required
description: Requirement for referral for evaluation of Bone Mineral Density (BMD).

name: osteoporosis_education_referral_required
description: Requirement for referral for osteoporosis education.

name: osteoporosis_prevention_treatment_program_required
description: Requirement for participation in an osteoporosis prevention/treatment program.

name: exclusion_back_pain_not_primarily_vcf_related
description: Exclusion criterion: Current back pain is not primarily due to the identified acute or subacute VCF(s).

name: exclusion_osteomyelitis_or_discitis
description: Exclusion criterion: Presence of osteomyelitis or discitis.

name: exclusion_active_systemic_or_surgical_site_infection
description: Exclusion criterion: Presence of active systemic or surgical site infection.

name: exclusion_pregnancy
description: Exclusion criterion: Patient is pregnant.

name: exclusion_greater_than_three_vertebral_fractures_per_procedure
description: Exclusion criterion: More than three vertebral fractures per procedure.

name: exclusion_allergy_bone_cement_or_opacification_agents
description: Exclusion criterion: Allergy to bone cement or opacification agents.

name: exclusion_uncorrected_coagulopathy
description: Exclusion criterion: Presence of uncorrected coagulopathy.

name: exclusion_spinal_instability
description: Exclusion criterion: Presence of spinal instability.

name: exclusion_myelopathy_from_fracture
description: Exclusion criterion: Myelopathy resulting from the fracture.

name: exclusion_neurologic_deficit
description: Exclusion criterion: Presence of a neurologic deficit.

name: exclusion_neural_impingement
description: Exclusion criterion: Presence of neural impingement.

name: exclusion_fracture_retropulsion_or_canal_compromise
description: Exclusion criterion: Presence of fracture retropulsion or canal compromise.

name: population_over_50_affected_by_osteoporosis_percentage
description: Percentage of people over 50 years of age affected by osteoporosis or low bone mass in the United States.

name: fracture_prevalence_women_over_50_percentage
description: Percentage of women over 50 years of age who eventually experience fragility fractures.

name: fracture_prevalence_men_over_50_percentage
description: Percentage of men over 50 years of age who eventually experience fragility fractures.

name: vcf_proportion_of_osteoporotic_fractures_percentage
description: Percentage of osteoporotic fractures constituted by vertebral compression fractures (VCFs).

name: vcf_mortality_risk_10_year_medicare_percentage
description: 10-year mortality risk following a VCF diagnosis based on Medicare claims data.

name: nsm_treatment_options_description
description: Non-surgical management treatment options for symptomatic osteoporotic VCF, including anti-osteoporosis therapy, analgesics, limited activity/bed rest, back brace, and physical therapy.
